title: Water Leakage in Bathroom
description: Water is leaking from the bathroom ceiling. Student reported water dripping continuously.
notes: Fixed pipe connection and replaced damaged ceiling tiles. Issue resolved.

title: Air Conditioner Not Working
description: AC unit in room B-205 is not cooling properly. Students complaining of hot room.
notes: Technician called. Waiting for spare parts delivery.

title: Deep Cleaning Required
description: Room needs deep cleaning after student checkout. Walls and floors need thorough cleaning.
notes: Complete deep cleaning done. Room ready for new occupant.

title: Electrical Socket Not Working
description: Power socket near study table is not working. Student unable to charge devices.
notes: Replaced faulty socket and checked wiring. All working properly now.

title: Monthly Room Inspection
description: Routine monthly inspection of room condition, fixtures, and cleanliness.
notes: Room in good condition. Minor cleaning required, informed housekeeping.

title: Door Lock Replacement
description: Door lock is jammed and key is not working properly. Student unable to lock room.
notes: New lock ordered. Will install once received.

title: Window Glass Cracked
description: Window glass has a crack. Needs replacement for safety and insulation.
notes: Glass ordered from supplier. Installation scheduled for tomorrow.

title: Furniture Upgrade
description: Replace old study table and chair with new ergonomic furniture.
notes: Furniture ordered. Delivery expected by end of week.

title: Pest Control Treatment
description: Student reported ants in room. Pest control treatment required.
notes: Pest control treatment completed. Room sealed and cleaned thoroughly.

title: WiFi Signal Weak
description: WiFi signal is very weak in this room. Students unable to attend online classes.
notes: Installed WiFi extender. Signal strength now excellent.

title: Ceiling Fan Making Noise
description: Ceiling fan is making loud noise and wobbling. Needs repair or replacement.
notes: Scheduled for inspection. May need bearing replacement.

title: Paint Touch-up Required
description: Wall paint is peeling in several places. Touch-up painting required.
notes: Paint and supplies ready. Will complete during student absence.

title: Bathroom Drain Blocked
description: Bathroom drain is blocked causing water to accumulate. Urgent cleaning needed.
notes: Plumber on site. Working to clear the blockage.

title: Mattress Replacement
description: Mattress is old and uncomfortable. Student requesting replacement.
notes: New mattress ordered. Delivery scheduled for Monday.

title: Light Bulb Replacement
description: Main ceiling light bulb is not working. Simple replacement needed.
notes: LED bulb replaced. Working perfectly now.
